data.name: Don't Cry over Spilt Eggnog
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

A mysterious homeless man named Jarvis, who really loves eggnog, thinks he is going to visit his loving sister Tracey at her trailer for a Christmas get together. When Jarvis arrives he is confronted with a good spirited intervention to try to help him get off of the streets, but his bitchy sister Charlie ruins the occasion and things take a turn for the strange. Written and directed by Michael Patrick Rogers. Starring: Chip Carriere Rachel G. Whittle Amy Wickenheiser
data.about_the_game:
A mysterious homeless man named Jarvis, who really loves eggnog, thinks he is going to visit his loving sister Tracey at her trailer for a Christmas get together. When Jarvis arrives he is confronted with a good spirited intervention to try to help him get off of the streets, but his bitchy sister Charlie ruins the occasion and things take a turn for the strange.

Written and directed by Michael Patrick Rogers.


Starring:
Chip Carriere
Rachel G. Whittle
Amy Wickenheiser
data.short_description: A mysterious homeless man named Jarvis is confronted with an intervention at his sisterâ€™s Airstream trailer when he arrives for what he is led to believe will be a Christmas get together.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
